rows.label: tlk45300157_01_msg0001
rows.name:
This is Shamayim Plant.
Entry is forbidden to all
but authorized personnel.

rows.label: tlk45300157_01_msg0002
rows.name:
This plant is where we convert the
heat from inside the Divine Beast
into energy for our steam engines.

rows.label: tlk45300157_01_msg0003
rows.name:
You could call it the foundation of
the Superbian Empire's technology.

rows.label: tlk45300157_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It's connected to the plant outside
the city by gondola, but don't you
dare try anything funny, hear?
